mapper.select: SELECT t1.name,concat(t1.channel,'/',t2.`op`,'.shtml') `key`,concat(t1.param,':',t2.op) param FROM t_sys_menu t1 JOIN t_sys_operate t2 ON t1.id = t2.menu;

select * from t_sys_menu a
a.state = 1
and a.pid = #{menuid}
and a.pid is null
order by a.ordno

SELECT t1.id,t1.name,t1.img,t1.pid,t1.ordno FROM t_sys_menu t1 JOIN ( SELECT menu FROM t_sys_role_operate t1 JOIN t_sys_operate t2 ON t1.op_id = t2.id AND t1.role = #{role} AND t2.isshow = 1 GROUP BY menu ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.menu AND t1.state = 1 UNION ALL SELECT t1.id,t1.name,t1.img,t1.pid,t1.ordno FROM t_sys_menu t1 WHERE t1.state = 1 AND t1.pid IS NULL ORDER BY ordno

select a.* from t_sys_operate a left join t_sys_role_operate b on (a.menu = b.menu and a.op = b.op) left join t_sys_role d on (b.role = d.id) left join t_sys_manager f on (d.id = f.role) where a.menu = #{menu} and f.managerid =#{managerid}
SELECT t2.* FROM t_sys_role_operate t1 JOIN t_sys_operate t2 ON t1.op_id = t2.id AND t1.role = #{role} AND t2.menu = #{menu}
